original_text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep: and when they were awake, they saw his glory, and the two men that stood with him.
korean_text: 베드로와 및 함께 있는 자들이 깊이 졸다가 온전히 깨어나 예수의 영광과 및 함께 선 두 사람을 보더니

sentences.original_text: But Peter and they that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 베드로와 그와 함께 있던 자들은

sentences.original_text: and the two men that stood with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 서 있던 두 사람을 보았다.
